meanings.sent1: The unisex shirt can be worn by anyone, regardless of gender.
meanings.sent2: The store sells unisex clothing that can be worn by both men and women.
meanings.sent3: The unisex bathroom sign confused some people, who weren't sure which door to choose.
meanings.sent4: The unisex haircut salon was a melting pot of different styles and preferences.
meanings.sent5: The unisex fragrance was a hit among couples who enjoyed sharing scents.

meanings.definition: Designed to be suitable for both sexes.
meanings.sent1: The designer created a unisex line of clothing that appealed to a wide range of customers.
meanings.sent2: The unisex uniforms for the team were practical and versatile.
meanings.sent3: The unisex fashion show featured models of all genders showcasing the latest trends.
meanings.sent4: The unisex brand aimed to break stereotypes and promote inclusivity in fashion.
meanings.sent5: The unisex accessories complemented any outfit, making them a popular choice for many.
